name: IronKnight
description:
The sky roared and the flames of the city continued to burn. The enemy has broken through the line of defense of mankind, and warships from outer space are invading the last home of mankind. Rise up, iron knight, drive your iron car and fight for your protection city.
Choose the helicopter that suits you, deal with the enemy in the air, control your helicopter skillfully, avoid the enemy's attack, pour ammunition on the enemy, destroy every enemy that can be eliminated, and become the sword of mankind in the intense and fierce battle. The brave wins.

Specific and distinctive control: Control the engine of the helicopter at any time, so as to control the hovering, take-off and landing of the helicopter. Controlling the direction and engine at the same time allows the helicopter to move forward and backward. Need to pay attention to the inertia caused by the collision.

Watch out for support at any time: Every truck will come with support weapons and repairs at any time, you need to pay attention to this, especially when your helicopter is warning, you need to repair in time, otherwise you will be destroyed quickly.

Achievements: The true trump card always holds countless accolades, showing the world your achievements.

Hero Ranking: Real heroes always have high strategic value.

Music: Each car has its own music, fight in the best rock.

Background color: You can choose to set your favorite background color in the options to experience different game atmospheres.

Music Mode: Provides two music modes, you can choose mixing mode and non-mixing mode in the options.
